name: Demo Day Finalist: Phantasma
description:
Phantasma by Jenna S.

Game Summary:

You are a ghost trying to figure out who you were and how you died. It's both topdown and sidescroller, there is also battling too!

Game Controls:

To enter full screen, click the expand icon on the bottom right

  • WASD to move
  • Click to interact and continue dialogue
  • Hold SPACE to charge jump attack
